text: Johann Berthold von Höffer (born in Ljubljana on 24 July 1667 - died 1718) was a nobleman from Ljubljana, and an amateur Slovenian composer.George J. Buelow A history of baroque music 2004 p436 He founded The Academia Philharmonicorum, Ljubljana in 1701, and primarily composed Latin oratorios.Oto Luthar The land between: a history of Slovenia 2008 p231 His artistic name in the Academia was Operose Devius.Elisabeth Theresia Fritz-Hilscher, Theophil Antonicek Die Wiener Hofmusikkapelle: Krisenzeiten der Hofmusikkapellen 2006 p89 "Die Seele der Unternehmung war Johann Berthold Höffer, ein Krainer Patrizier und erster Direktor der Vereinigung mit dem Akademie-Namen Operose Devius (der Einsame)." ==See also== * Ljubljana Academy of Music ==References== Category:1667 births Category:1718 deaths Category:Slovenian composers Category:People from Ljubljana
title: Johann Berthold von Höffer
